m_szDocTitle: World’s first hydrogen car-sharing service to roll out in Germany - PetrolPlaza - News
m_szDocSumamry: World’s first hydrogen car-sharing service to roll out in Germany Industry news Posted / Last update: 06-05-2016 | Author: PetrolPlaza Correspondent Daniel Infante Tuaño Multinational industrial gas firm Linde Group has launched a car-sharing service, which exclusively uses hydrogen-powered fuel-cell cars. The pioneering service called BeeZero will be offered in Munich, Germany by summer this year, according to a company release. Source: Linde Group website See also: Linde to establish network of hydrogen fuelling stations in California Shell to roll-out large hydrogen pump network in Germany
